sub_title: Commercial specialist with a passion for Food & Beverages, Retail and Innovation
summary:
Sales & Distribution / Off & On Trade Management / Marketing & Finance / Sourcing & Merchandising

All round Sales Professional, results-oriented with a passion for finance and broad experience in Sales, corporate marketing management as well as start-up environment, development and roll out of channel marketing,  always with a focus on improving gross margin/profit, market share and profitability in several markets. Career includes 22 years of national and international exposure within Heineken Int, delivering tangible results in Sales, building a start-up within E-commerce within 5 markets in 1.5 years, creating double-digit Mio turnover (from zero), implementation pricing/merchandising principles and management trade terms, building Heineken brand blocks within Ahold (Retail) and increasing baseline volume in a consolidation market, create trade marketing strategies for new channels and leading cross-functional teams in relation to the biggest retailers in the Netherlands (Ahold) and international (Metro, Kaufland, Lidl and Aldi). 
Experienced in managing (R)etailers, Third Parties E-commerce Marketplaces, Distributors, Wholesalers and New Business partners. 

Judicial, enthusiastic, honest and focussed leader with a “make it happen” mentality. Strong analytic skills and best in class negotiator in national (the Dutch OpCo) and international level.

Areas of expertise:
•	Pricing & Promotion Management 
•	Sourcing & Merchandising Management 
•	Trade Terms Management 
•	Channel Segmentation, Strategy & Activation 
•	Distributor Management incl Trade Execution 	
•	SalesTeam Building, Coaching & Leadership
•	Change Management 
•	Global Brand Management (Amstel)

education.field_of_study: Business Administration and Management, General, Specialism in Pricing Management

school.name: The Gap Partnership (The Complete Skilled Negotiator)

profile_positions.description: Established in 2020, FoodinRetail is a private-owned importer, distributor, and marketer of International Food & Beverages. Our mission is simple: to provide first-class products and services to customers in the off-trade, specialist retail, on-trade, and direct to consumers.
profile_positions.title: Founder FoodinRetail BV

profile_positions.description: Established in 2020, DrinkM b.v. is a private-owned importer, distributor and marketer of International Beverages. Our mission is simple: to provide first-class products and services to our customers in the off-trade, specialist retail, on-trade and direct to consumers. For the off-trade, our purchasing and account team enjoy excellent and long-standing relationships with all Dutch and Belgium Retailers. We are also now supplying increasing numbers of independent retail outlets with our growing collection of authentic brands. Our Mission: "Sharing Authentic Beverages"
profile_positions.title: Owner and Co-founder DrinkM B.V.

profile_positions.description: BEERWULF.com is a brand-new online platform designed by and dedicated to beer enthusiasts. Our mission is to make great craft and specialty beers accessible for everyone. Therefore we make it easy, rewarding and fun to discover the world of beer. We want to become THE online destination for beer lovers all over Europe.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Head of Sourcing and Merchandising

profile_positions.description:
Drive relationship with International retailers (Lidl, Aldi, Kaufland and Metro)
Drive global brands growth at International retailers
Drive cross functional agenda
Drive customer management and sales capability
profile_positions.title: Global Customer Director Schwarz Group (Lidl/Kaufland), Aldi (Sud/Nord) & Metro/Makro AG

profile_positions.description:
Heineken Netherlands Retail MT member responsible for the commercial management of Ahold and  to create new trade terms, pricing policies and promotional tactics for all the Dutch retailers. 
Realised a three-year mission and vision statement for the Dutch retail market. 
Co-developed of the Heineken Trade Terms Strategy for the Netherlands and engaged and aligned the Retailers, Stakeholders and Corporate to implement the strategy. Lead, inspired and managed the Ahold Retail team and its project, aiming to drive Baseline Growth and Market share within the Dutch retail markets. Key activities include implementation of Building Brand Block within Albert Heijn (830 hyper supermarkets) and generating growth within a declining market.                                                                

Selected Contributions:
♦	Commercial management of bottle/can volume at Ahold (all formats of Ahold in Benelux)  on yearly turnover € xxx million and market share targets, price negotiations, brand and packaging portfolio management and promotional calendar implementation. 
♦	Roll out promotion and price strategy aligned with GFK Aimark (international marketing innovation agency) and OC&C for the Dutch retail market with one goal: Creating a disproportional growth in the Netherlands.
♦	Development and national roll out of a new Promotional Tactics Program (Rules and Guidelines Promotional Activation), including governance and auditing.
profile_positions.title: Customer Director Ahold Retail

profile_positions.description:
Started as a Retail MT member, responsible for the second retailer in the Netherland (C1000), Dirk vd Broek (untill 2008 (moved to SuperUnie), Super de Boer/Jumbo and all the Dutch wholesalers like Metro (Makro) and Foodservice (all Dutch distributors, concerning On trade and Catering)
Selected Contributions:
♦	Responsible for introducing new Trade Terms Heineken Netherlands off trade. 
♦	Responsible for the consolidation within Retail from Heineken perspective.
profile_positions.title: National Account Manager C1000/Jumbo Super de Boer (Bijeen/Jumbo Holding)

profile_positions.description:
Started in Sales as an Account Manager in SuperUnie (family-owned Dutch retailers) with the responsibility of stable market share, brand and portfolio management, and promotional calendar implementation. Also responsible for the introduction of BeerTender (personal home draft beer system) in some Retail channels.
Selected Contributions:
♦	Two annual deals with all members of SuperUnie with overall growth 
♦	Set up a Sales strategy for all the new channels, a balanced distribution strategy of the Krups BeerTenders and kegs of several brands, the coordination of all the sales activities, the price negotiations, based on a yearly target.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager SuperUnie

profile_positions.description:
Created a new department Convenience in Trade Marketing with a special focus on creating consumer and customer value through development and implementation of (international) programs, tools, promotions and b-2-b and b-2-c in various channels and segments for the whole brands portfolio. 
Selected Contributions:
♦	Manage the shop-in-shop concept “Heineken Store” at Blokker (# 510 drugstores) based on a sales target
♦	Responsible for the introduction of a new concept called Snack Box, a co-creation with Coca Cola, Unilever and Heineken.
profile_positions.title: Channel Developing Manager Convenience

profile_positions.description:
Established and expanded the Amstel brand footprint by developing a new global media platform, lead the development of compelling global sponsorships, advertising campaigns and activation programs on a local and global basis.
Selected Contributions:
♦	Developed new Media communication and internet activation programs, related to the UEFA Champions League sponsorship. Responsible for all Amstel new media projects in Europe and US.
♦	CEO for new business start-up Voetbal.nl, a joint venture with World Online and Amstel Netherlands, which created a new Dutch online football platform with more than 1 mio page views a month.
profile_positions.title: New Media Manager Amstel International

profile_positions.description: Create a best practice platform for Sales Promotion and Merchandise within all the Heineken OpCo's
profile_positions.title: Database Manager Sales promotion
